subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Mesut Ozil and Loïc Rémy are very much the modern players, both seeking recognition in a sport that, almost by the day, demonstrates that nationality is a choice as well as a right.
snippet: Mesut Ozil and Loïc Rémy are very much the modern players, both seeking recognition in a sport that, almost by the day, demonstrates that nationality is a choice as well as a right.
